reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We actually only booked it because the good rates we got for the hotel we were in, didn't apply for that day, and we needed a hotel close to the airport for our last day in Chicago.
reviews.title: what a dump

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It started bad, checking in was an awful experience. The man who I spoke to, was rude, unpolite and not willing to help at all. I tried to ignore this, it was my last day in Chicago anyways, we only needed a place to sleep.
reviews.title: Wow!!!!

reviews.text: The room was a dump!! really dirty and unhygienic. The maintenace of that place is zero.
reviews.title: RUN AWAY!!!!!!! FAST!!

reviews.text: Well, sometimes is worth to pay a little bit more to avoid this type of stuff.
reviews.title: You have been warned!!!
